nodes.text: Let me know if you see anything strange around, citizen
transitions: I actually found something quite strange. The man sitting next to me has a bloody knife, I think he is a murderer and was planning on crashing the train

nodes.text: Gee whizakers, we've been looking for this man for weeks! Good job lad. YOU'RE A HERO.
